page.title: 11WORTHINGTON SIMPSON
page.content: My Dad wanted to be a machine operator, but later decided that he would prefer to be a fitter and served his apprenticeship with Worthington Simpsons Ltd. They were founded in the 1880's and make all types of pumps from central heating size to one which will be used for emptying dry docks in Korea. My Dad's job is in prototype and development test work.He tests all the new products and improvements to existing products. He works in a small department with a fitter and sometimes an apprentice. He is given a fairly free hand at work and likes the variety of jobs he gets, and also the opportunity of meeting people who come in from outside with new ideas. He travels to work on a pushbike because we live fairly close to the factory.
